TempUserWordNamesLength.description: The number of words to use in the account name.

TempUserWordNamesList.description: The words used to generate a name. One of 'pages' or 'words' must contain values. See the README for more information.

TempUserWordNamesCentralWiki.description: The central wiki to use for fetching the word list. If not set, the local wiki will be used.

TempUserWordNamesUseIndex.description: Append the index to the generated account name to ensure uniqueness.
